article_title: QUIZ: Which presidential candidate has similar views to you?
article_text:
Guns, abortion, minimum wage... these are just some of the hot button topics that may matter to you, but do they matter to your favorite presidential candidate?

Take our in-depth quiz below to see who your views best align with. (To view fullscreen, click here)
